Content: All empires generated during the progenitor-phase have to fall, at
precisley the time the player is starting to work with their own empire
(As the progentior-minigame is also a method to keep players busy while
players with earlier start-dates take their setup rounds). This can be
solved by an randomized, automatic ''spin-down'', which automatically
selects the cause(s) for the fall of the empire and also distributes
